content.question: Did your {{ divorceWho }} leave without your agreement?
content.questionHint: You can only use desertion as a reason for divorce if you didn't agree to your {{ divorceWho }} leaving you. For example, if they abandoned you, or took a job abroad without your agreement.
content.yes: Yes, they left without my agreement
content.no: No, I agreed that they should go

reasonForDivorceDesertionAgreed.required: Select yes if you agreed to your {{ divorceWho }} leaving

content.question: A wnaeth eich {{ divorceWho }} adael heb ichi gydsynio?
content.questionHint: Ni allwch ddefnyddio gadael yn rheswm dros ysgaru ond os nad oeddech' yn cydsynio i’ch {{ divorceWho }} eich gadael. Er enghraifft, os gwnaeth eich gadael, neu os cymerodd swydd dramor heb ichi gytuno.
content.yes: Do, gadawodd heb imi gytuno i hynny

reasonForDivorceDesertionAgreed.required: Dewiswch do os gwnaethoch gytuno i’ch {{ divorceWho }} adael
